item.title: Linda add a quote by Liane Moriarty
item.description: "Early love is exciting and exhilarating. It's light and bubbly. Anyone can love like that. But after three children, after a separation and a near-divorce, after you've hurt each other and forgiven each other, bored each other and surprised each other, after you've seen the worst and the best-- well, that sort of love is ineffable. It deserves its own word." -- Liane Moriarty

item.title: Linda add a quote by Liane Moriarty
item.description: "Falling in love was easy.anyone could fall. It was holding on that was tricky" -- Liane Moriarty

item.title: Linda add a quote by Liane Moriarty
item.description: "None of us ever know all the possible courses our lives could have and maybe should have taken. It's probably just as well. Some secrets are meant to stay secret forever. Just ask Pandora." -- Liane Moriarty
